title: Into everything: providing for toddlers in child care
creator_credit: Alex Jaye and Video Media Production
brief_description: Shows how the developmental stages of pre-kindergarten children can be positively influenced by the provision of appropriate adult support and facilities in child care. Aimed at chilcare providers with little or no knowledge of cognitive and emotional stages of child development. This video emphasises that safe, colourful, cheerful and organised programs of care best facilitate proper psychomotor development. Appropriate for Professional Development and Personal Development (Home Economics).
